TODO app Enter Email ID Enter Password Enter Registered Email ID OTP An OTP will be sent to you on this email id. You cannot change or edit this email id once registered. Already have an account? New to todo? Sign up work and life, finally. Organise your Next todo Log In Register Sign up OTP You will receive OTP on your registered email id. Enter OTP Your OTP will expire in 5:00 Authorise Description Title Save Task Delete Task
00:00 300000 //5*60*1000 = 300000
